Previous: īrNext: īś

√īrṣy 'be jealous'

present: [1.] ī́rṣyati etc.  

verbal: īrṣyita  

derivatives: īrṣyā́ AV.+  īrṣyaka C.  īrṣyin C.  īrṣyālu C.  īrṣyú AV.+  īrṣyitavya C.  

Evidently a secondary root, but of doubtful origin (BR., from irasy). Not seldom written without the y in later works.
